results.title: Compilation: one hundred entertainments
results.brief_description: One hundred entertainments: Follows an acrobatic troupe in Shensi Province as they perform and talk about their lives. “Son of the ocean”: A film crew travels on a boat on the Yangtze and talks to some of the passengers.

results.title: Compilation: not so much a desert more a way of life
results.brief_description: Not so much a desert more a way of life: Much of Australia is described as desert, but wherever he looks, David Bellamy finds life among the sand and rocks. “The Great barriers” (prod. Mike Weatherley): Australia’s coasts are battleground’s where seaweeds, coral and mangroves fight for survival against the ravages of the ocean.

results.title: Compilation: il bruco the apple worm
results.brief_description: Three animated films by Bruno Bozzetto. “The Apple worm”: A humorous look at the troubles of an apple worm. “The Swimming pool”: A man who looks forward to using his new swimming pool is thwarted at every turn. “Self service”: A satirical cartoon about a group of enterprising mosquitoes.

results.title: Compilation: animal movie
results.brief_description: Animal movie (Canada): An animated film to help children understand how animals move. “Martin the cobbler” (U.S.): A clay animated film about a Russian shoemaker who discovers new meanings in life by meditating on old truths. “Model railroading unlimited” (U.S.): A young man’s absorption in model railroading serves as the source of comedy.

results.title: Compilation skydive
results.creator_credit: Devon Chierighlio, Mike Vitlow, Philip Dauber and Carl Boenish
results.brief_description: Sky dive (U.S.); Carl Baenish, the world’s leading skydiving filmmaker shares some spectacular footage. “Spaceborne” (U.S.); An exciting selection of film footage taken during the manned moon flights. “The Wizard of speed and time” (U.S.); From out of his mountain cave blasts a Green Wizard moving at incredible speeds.

results.title: Competitive swimming: starts, turns, stroke drills
results.brief_description: Demonstrates the correct form for all swimming starts - grab start for freestyle, breaststroke and butterfly; correct entry for freestyle, butterfly and breaststroke; relay starts and the backstroke start for both long and short courses. Illustrates all turns, using slow motion and underwater camera, and also shows progressive drills for all strokes.
results.description: Demonstrates the correct form for all swimming starts - grab start for freestyle, breaststroke and butterfly; correct entry for freestyle, butterfly and breaststroke; relay starts and the backstroke start for both long and short courses. Illustrates all turns, using slow motion and underwater camera, and also shows progressive drills for all strokes.

results.title: Competitive diving: men and women optional dives. Pt. 2
results.brief_description: Using simple language and thorough examples, this program profiles the Reverse & Twist dives, including the Reverse Somersault Tuck and Pike, and Forward and Backward Somersault.

results.title: Competitive Diving Men and Women Optional Dives
results.brief_description: Using simple language and thorough examples this video looks at several popular optional dives in competitive diving. These include Forward, Backward and Inward dives.

results.title: Competitive Diving Men and Women Fundamentals of Diving
results.brief_description: Using simple language and thorough examples this video looks at the three fundamentals of diving: Approach & Takeoff, Flight & Execution and Entry. Within these categories the Forward Approach Hurdle and Back Takeoff; Tuck, Pike and Straight Positions; Tower Approach and Takeoff, are examined.
